paragraph1: The Gamma Omicron Alumni Association (GOAA) serves as the enduring bond between more than 1,200 brothers who wore the Pi Kappa Alpha badge at Ohio University. Through events, newsletters, scholarships, and support of the active chapter, GOAA keeps the brotherhood alive long after graduation.
pull_quote: The true measure of a fraternity is not in the men it initiates, but in the men it produces.
paragraph2: GOAA organizes annual reunions, a popular golf outing, and "Feed‑a‑Pike" nights that bring alumni and actives together. Annual dues of $35 fund these activities, the chapter newsletter, web hosting, and travel to leadership conferences.
paragraph3: Tax-deductible donations to the William Sutherin and Martha Banfield Memorial Scholarship funds are managed through our 501(c)(3) educational fund, ensuring your generosity directly benefits deserving brothers.
dues_card_items: Alumni events, reunions, and golf outing
